text:
SaqtAyaq svAhA# saqhasrA#yaq svAhAq &yutA#yaq svAhA# niqyutA#yaq svAhA$ praqyutA#yaq svAhA &rbu#dAyaq svAhAq nya#rbudAyaq svAhA# samuqdrAyaq svAhAq maddhyA#yaq svAhA &ntA#yaq svAhA# parAqd^^rdhAyaq svAhOqShasEq svAhAq vyu#ShTyaiq svAhO#dEShyaqtE svAhO$dyaqtE svAhOdi#tAyaq svAhA# suvaqrgAyaq svAhA# lOqkAyaq svAhAq sarva#smaiq svAhA$ || 50 
(SaqtAyAq-&ShTAtri(gm)#Sat) (A20)

Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 20 Anuvaakams :- 
(sAqdhyAH Sha#D rAqtraM - ku#suruqbinda#H saptarAqtraM - bRuhaqspati#raShTarAqtraM - praqjApa#tiqstAH kShudha#nnavarAqtraM - praqjApa#tirakAmayataq daSa#hOtArAtra - mRuqtava# - aindravAyaqvAgrA$n - gAyaqtrO vai - praqjApa#tiqH sa dvA#daSarAqtraM - na vA -Eka#smAq - Eka#smaiq - dvAByA$M - triqByaH - caqturBya#H - paq~jcaByO# - daqSaByO# - vi(gm)Saqtyai - pa#~jcAqSatE# - SaqtAya# - vi(gm)SaqtiH )

Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 Series of Panchaatis :-
(sAqdhyA - a#smA iqmE lOqkA - gA#yaqtraM - ~Mvai tRuqtIyaq - mEka#smai - pa~jcAqSat )

First and Last Padam of Second Prasnam of 7th Kandam
(sAqdhyAH - sarva#smaiq svAhA$ )

|| hari#H OM ||


|| kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM saptamakANDE dvitIyaH praSnaH samAptaH ||
==================================

OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH, SrI guruByO namaH
haqriqH OM

7.3	 saptamakANDE tRutIyaH praSnaH - satrajAtanirUpaNaM
